extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQ: ENPH 239 and ENPH 344 or PHYS 344 or permission of department. Must be registered in BSCE.
COREQS: ENPH 332 or permission of department

basic.description: Topics and applications in modern physical optics, culminating with the development of the laser and its current applications. Topics include: Gaussian beam propagation, optical resonators, Fourier optics, fiber optics, holography, light-matter interaction using classical and semi-classical models, and the basic theory and types of lasers.
basic.subject: ENPH
basic.title: Laser Optics
